name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee
display_help: You can use Energy Melee to power your blows with pure energy. These focused power attacks often Disorient opponents. Like all Stalker primary attack powers, Energy Melee attacks can land a Critical Hit for double damage, if you are properly Hidden or if your target is Slept or Held.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Barrage
powers.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals moderate smashing and energy damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate smashing and energy damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of smashing and energy damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Assassins_Strike
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay
38000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Stun
powers.display_help: By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor smashing and energy damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Energy_Transfer
powers.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme smashing and energy damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Unlike other Stalker primary attack powers, Energy Transfer cannot land a Critical hit. However, if this attack is executed successfully while Hidden, you can avoid the Hit Point loss to yourself and deal a massive blow with no penalty. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

display_info: 166.83 special damage on self after 0.1s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Energy_Melee.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating smashing and energy attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. A Critical hit with Total Focus deals extra damage, but not double. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
